page.title: 01THE ACTON AREA
page.content: Acton is a small village near Nantwich.The land is mainly pasture,used for grazing and silage. In the middle of Acton are all the buildings.There is a Primary School, a Church and a pub called the Star.There are lots of houses,especially down Wilbreham road.Dorfold Hall is an old that is open to the public on Sundays and Mondays.There are lots of farms in Acton,two of the oldest are Village farm and Chuch farm.There is a moat where a house used to be.In Acton school there are one hundred and twenty children and five teachers. The Church is called St Mary's,the vicar is the Rev Martin.There is also an old windmill but it has no sails.
